name: Cubathon (Game4Fame)
description:
Cubathon is a level based 3D runner developed using the c# Unity Game Engine. It was designed to be a basic 3D sequel to our first game "Cuby". Currently, Cubathon is in version 1.0. This game can only be played on PC and currently supports Windows 10 and 11. The game will also be receiving lots of updates down the line.

The project credits will be displayed at the end of the game. Thanks to "Brackeys" on YouTube for the tutorial on the game's physics engine.

For more information, please visit the product page on our website:

https://game4fameoperation.wixsite.com/game4fame/cubathon
